jacdac.CharacterScreenReg.Brightness:
Read-write ratio u0.16 (uint16_t). Brightness of the screen. `0` means off.
* ```
const [brightness] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u0.16")
```
jacdac.CharacterScreenReg.Columns:
Constant # uint8_t. Gets the number of columns.
* ```
const [columns] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u8")
```
jacdac.CharacterScreenReg.Message:
Read-write string (bytes). Text to show. Use `\n` to break lines.
* ```
const [message] = jdunpack<[string]>(buf, "s")
```
jacdac.CharacterScreenReg.Rows:
Constant # uint8_t. Gets the number of rows.
* ```
const [rows] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u8")
```
jacdac.CharacterScreenReg.TextDirection:
Read-write TextDirection (uint8_t). Specifies the RTL or LTR direction of the text.
* ```
const [textDirection] = jdunpack<[jacdac.CharacterScreenTextDirection]>(buf, "u8")
```
jacdac.CharacterScreenReg.Variant:
Constant Variant (uint8_t). Describes the type of character LED screen.
* ```
const [variant] = jdunpack<[jacdac.CharacterScreenVariant]>(buf, "u8")
```
modules.CharacterScreenClient.brightness: Brightness of the screen. `0` means off.
modules.CharacterScreenClient.clear: Clears all text from the display.
modules.CharacterScreenClient.message: Text to show. Use `\n` to break lines.
modules.CharacterScreenClient.setBrightn: Brightness of the screen. `0` means off.
modules.CharacterScreenClient.setLine: Overrides the content of a single line at a 0-based index.
modules.CharacterScreenClient.setMessage: Text to show. Use `\n` to break lines.
modules.CharacterScreenClient.setTextDir: Specifies the RTL or LTR direction of the text.
modules.CharacterScreenClient.textDirect: Specifies the RTL or LTR direction of the text.
modules.CharacterScreenClient.variant: Describes the type of character LED screen.
